rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A minimalist open space with integrated storage and a subtle Vastu compliant layout. The entrance is positioned in the North-East direction to invite positivity.

rooms.name: Studio Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light. Furnishings are minimal with functional modern decor. Vastu considerations ensure harmonious energy flow in the central zone.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact, open kitchen integrated within the living area. Designed with minimalist cabinetry and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows along one wall for improved workflow and Vastu balance.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom designed with minimal fixtures and modern finishes, placed in an ideal location per Vastu guidelines to maintain privacy while ensuring smooth traffic flow.

openings.description: Large glass panels that let in abundant natural light and provide a seamless indoor-outdoor connection. Complies with local building norms for safety and energy efficiency.
